remarks: Value of a univariate polynomial evaluation mapping an additive group sum to a group sum of the evaluated variable.  (Contributed by AV, 17-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evl1gsumadd.q $e |- Q = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1gsumadd.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1gsumadd.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1gsumadd.p $e |- P = ( R ^s K ) $.
evl1gsumadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
evl1gsumadd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1gsumadd.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. N ) -> Y e. B ) $.
evl1gsumadd.n $e |- ( ph -> N C_ NN0 ) $.
evl1gsumaddval.f $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
evl1gsumaddval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. K ) $.
evl1gsumaddval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q ` ( W gsum ( x e. N |-> Y ) ) ) ` C ) = ( R gsum ( x e. N |-> ( ( Q ` Y ) ` C ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d K x $.
$d N x $.
$d Q x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
